text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Charles Douglas to Austin, Tuscumbia, Ala., February 15, 1825. Great interest in Texas, but emigration checked by uncertainty on several points: (1) Will freedom of worship be winked at? (2) Are slaves safe? Can they be held as "working servants"? (3) Character of the soil? Climate? Navigation? etc., etc. Political news of United States and of Europe. */p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p* *location_mentioned*Tuscumbia Franklin County North Alabama*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="02-15-1825">Feb 15th 1825*/date_mentioned* */p* *p*Dr Sir*/p*
*p*I wrote you a long letter several, months ago and have been anxiously expecting an answer for a considerable time past, but thus far my wishes have not been gratified. I am inclined to think from your silence that the letter miscarried and as a good opportunity offers by a *person_mentioned*Mr Royal*/person_mentioned* who is about starting for your *location_mentioned*settlement*/location_mentioned* I embrace it to make a second communication. It would afford me much pleasure to receive from you as an old and highly esteemed acquaintance a long letter filled with information relative to yourself and the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* in which you reside. Much interest is excited about your *location_mentioned*settlement*/location_mentioned* and respectable people here are verry anxious to obtain satisfactory information upon the subject. In order to satisfy this laudable curiosity and to gratify my own private wishes I venture to ask you several questions which will be the easiest and best way of satisfying both, them and myself. I wish to know what the feelings of the Govt are at this time upon the subject of religion. Will it wink at liberty of conscience and permit good and worthy *person_mentioned*inhabitants*/person_mentioned* to peaceably assemble and worship their God in the way most agreeable to their feelings without evincing any disposition to make *person_mentioned*proselytes*/person_mentioned* or to interfere with the prevailing religion of the country. This is a subject of vast importance to the people of these *location_mentioned*U States*/location_mentioned* and has a most powerful effect in preventing respectable *person_mentioned*families*/person_mentioned* from removing from this to your *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*. To those who think liberally an exclusive religion presents no formidable difficulties but you are well apprised of the wonderful influence of education upon a subject involving the present and future happiness of *person_mentioned*Mankind*/person_mentioned*, particularly in a *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*like this where religious liberty exists in all its purity. The operation of your system [will be alarming?] to our *person_mentioned*Females*/person_mentioned* whose influence we must submit to in every thing relating to social and domestic happiness. We will not say they renounce the religion of our *person_mentioned*Fathers*/person_mentioned* or be deprived of the pleasures derived from its doctrines and ceremonies for all other earthly enjoyments. If deprived of these every other object would cease to please and all around would appear dark and dreary. An elysium under such circumstances would be more intolerable than *location_mentioned*Siberian desserts*/location_mentioned*. You may depend upon it that your exclusive system has a most discouraging effect upon imigration particularly among the more respectable classes of the community. If that first and most obnoxious article could be blotted from your constitution, my word for it, *person_mentioned*families*/person_mentioned* of respectability and influence would flock to your *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*from every part of the *location_mentioned*United States*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Our most valuable *person_mentioned*inhabitants*/person_mentioned* here own *person_mentioned*negroes*/person_mentioned*. I am therefore anxious to know what the laws are upon that subject. Can they be introduced as the labouring *person_mentioned*servants*/person_mentioned* of *person_mentioned*emigrants*/person_mentioned*? and, when are they free ? They are an important species of property here and our *person_mentioned*planters*/person_mentioned* are not willing to remove without they can first be assured of their being secured to them by the laws of your Govt.*/p*
*p*Inform me about the general appearance of your *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, its soil, and climate, particularly in that part of it immediately on or near the *location_mentioned*sea coast*/location_mentioned*. Is it high and dry or is it low and swampy ? Do springs abound and is it difficult to produce water by digging *location_mentioned*wells*/location_mentioned*? and is the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* as well adapted to sugar cane as to cotton? Are you subject to severe droughts during the summer? What is the size of the *location_mentioned*Colorado*/location_mentioned*, will it admit of schooner navigation up to your *location_mentioned*town*/location_mentioned*: and is the land immediately on the *location_mentioned*river*/location_mentioned* high or low and subject to inundation? How far is your *location_mentioned*town*/location_mentioned* from the *location_mentioned*sea coast*/location_mentioned* and would a store of goods to well in it ? What are your most common diseases; are bilious fevers frequent and severe and would a *person_mentioned*Doctor*/person_mentioned* do well among you? In what way do you dispose of your lands; do you give long credit to *location_mentioned*purchasers*/location_mentioned*, and how much is the extent that each *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*can posses? Must they settle it themselves or will you allow them to settle their purchases in the first instance with good and industrious *person_mentioned*families*/person_mentioned*? My reason for asking this question is that many of our first rate men might be induced to purchase if they were certain that it was not necessary for them to remove untill after their places were well improved and comfortably fixed with houses etc etc—Is your *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*well timbered, and what is your most common growth ? Please answer these questions and give as much other information as you conveniently can, all which will be very pleasing to me and may probably prove beneficial in its consequences to yourself, as I think, I can be of service to you in procuring *person_mentioned*settlers*/person_mentioned* that would do honour to any *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*. A letter coming from you would be considered as official and people would act accordingly. I take the liberty of suggesting the propriety of your having a*location_mentioned* mail rout*/location_mentioned* immediately established between your *location_mentioned*Town*/location_mentioned* and *location_mentioned*Natchitoches*/location_mentioned*, it would verry much facilitate the intercourse and prove advantageous to your *location_mentioned*settlement*/location_mentioned*. I am anxious to procure a good tract of *location_mentioned*land*/location_mentioned* immediately on the *location_mentioned*sea coast*/location_mentioned*, if I could do so I would remove to it with a number of good *person_mentioned*families*/person_mentioned*. If you know of such a situation where the land is good and where it will be healthy write me all about it. The only national news of importance is the Presidential election. The prominent *person_mentioned*candidates */person_mentioned*are *person_mentioned*General Jackson*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Mr. Adams*/person_mentioned*. The tug of war commenced at *location_mentioned*Washington city*/location_mentioned* on the *date_mentioned n="02-09-1825">9th of this month*/date_mentioned* and how it will end is uncertain. The prevailing opinion in this *location_mentioned*western country*/location_mentioned* is that *location_mentioned*Genl Jackson*/location_mentioned* will be elected. This present congress have voted *person_mentioned*Genl La Fayette*/person_mentioned* $200000 and given him a township of land to be selected by the *person_mentioned*President*/person_mentioned* of the *location_mentioned*u States*/location_mentioned*. This is as it should be and has proved to the world that republics are not ungrateful. It is now engaged in perfecting a law for the more effectual suppression of piracy. The law as reported provides for the building of 10 additional sloops of war of 20 guns each to be employed on the *location_mentioned*West India*/location_mentioned* station. To permit merchantmen vessels to arm in their own defence and allows a provision to such as are wounded whilst defending their vessels, and to make prizes of piratical vessels if they can. It also allows the *person_mentioned*officers*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*crews*/person_mentioned* of our National Vessels to pursue and if necessary to land in pursuit of *person_mentioned*pirates*/person_mentioned* and if the *person_mentioned*authorities*/person_mentioned* of the *location_mentioned*Towns*/location_mentioned* in which they secrete themselves attempt to protect them or refuse to give them up after a proper demand has been made to blockade such*location_mentioned* port*/location_mentioned* or place untill compliance is obtained. This law, I hope, will satisfy *person_mentioned*Mr. Vives*/person_mentioned* of *location_mentioned*Cuba*/location_mentioned* and the rascally *person_mentioned*governor of *location_mentioned*Po[r]to Rico*/location_mentioned* */person_mentioned*that we will no longer submit to their infamous conduct. The affairs of *location_mentioned*Europe*/location_mentioned* are in Statu Quo. Poor degraded *location_mentioned*Spain*/location_mentioned* is yet convulsed with intestine broils . and groaning under the iron arm of her cruel Monster of a *person_mentioned*King*/person_mentioned*. The *person_mentioned*French army*/person_mentioned* is about leaving that unfortunate *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* and what the consequences will be God only knows. I sincerely hope the *location_mentioned*nation*/location_mentioned* will react, and if it does I hope all those cursed fanatical *person_mentioned*monks*/person_mentioned* and tyranical *person_mentioned*villains*/person_mentioned* who have so long oppressed that people will be quickly made to bite the dust. As to *location_mentioned*Greece*/location_mentioned* every thing appears encouraging. Her *person_mentioned*army */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Navy */person_mentioned*have done wonders. The classical ground of *location_mentioned*Thermopolse*/location_mentioned* has been lately again and again crimsoned by the valor of her modern *person_mentioned*heroes*/person_mentioned* with the blood of her infidel *person_mentioned*oppressors*/person_mentioned* and her *person_mentioned*navy */person_mentioned*has covered itself with glory under the direction of her Gallant *person_mentioned* Canaris*/person_mentioned* and other valient *person_mentioned*Chieftains*/person_mentioned* and has driven, and is now blockading within the *location_mentioned*dardanells*/location_mentioned* the few remaining ships of the great*person_mentioned* Turkish fleet*/person_mentioned*. Do answer this by the very first opportunity and give me all the news. As I have nothing more at present to communicate I close by subscribing myself your sincere Friend and Obt Servt*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Charles Douglas*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Hon Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*bearer */person_mentioned*can tell you all about me and what I am doing I received a letter not long since from *person_mentioned*Doctor Parrot*/person_mentioned* he is still living in *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned* and is doing well—*/p*
*/div1*
